alert.note: Alert for Chippewa; Renville; Yellow Medicine (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 4:39PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Chippewa, northeastern Yellow Medicine and northwestern Renville Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 439 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Granite Falls, or 14 miles southeast of Montevideo, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Maynard around 455 PM CDT. This includes U.S. Highway 212 between mile markers 38 and 58. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in the Twin Cities.
